original_text: may have power, together with all the Lord’s holy people, to grasp how wide and long and high and deep is the love of Christ,
korean_text: 능히 모든 성도와 함께 지식에 넘치는 그리스도의 사랑을 알고

sentences.original_text: together with all the Lord's holy people
to grasp how wide and long and high and deep
sentences.korean_translation: 얼마나 넓고 길고 높고 깊은지를 깨닫고
